mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a summary of transactions from 1878 and 1879. Items listed include tobacco, rice, cheese, thread, buttons, calico, braid, various pieces of clothing, and cash. At the bottom it is stated that Wade received payment on January 8, 1880.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invoice for R. Hutcheson from Wade, January 1, 1880
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
